title: Marian Rivera is not saying no to working with Star Cinema
text:
20 Sep – Kapuso queen Marian Rivera is not saying no to working with Star Cinema again in the future, if such an opportunity arises.

As reported on ABS-CBN, the GMA star, who acknowledged the success of her fellow GMA-7 colleague Alden Richards' movie with the studio, "Hello, Love, Goodbye", stated that she has no qualms with such collaborations.

"Why not? If there is a good offer and Mother Lily [Monteverde] let me do it, sure," she said.

Rivera also revealed that she had actually received several movie offers earlier, but had to reject it due to her second pregnancy.

"I had two films pending before I got pregnant, so let's see if I can do it," she said.

Rivera's last collaboration with Star Cinema was the 2013 movie, "Kung Fu Divas".

(Photo Source: Marian Rivera Instagram)
description: The GMA actress says that she would welcome such opportunity if there is one in the future
